name: 2017 Bravo X Sniper Killer: Shot To Kill Pro
name_original: 2017 Bravo X Sniper Killer: Shot To Kill Pro
description:
This is an amazing 3rd person counter strike like shooter, Fight enemy bots in survival modes. Test your special skill; arm and marshal yourself with deadly alone epic war assassin machine guns.

New Features:

– 3 different maps
– 60 different missions
– 4 different enemies
– 2 different weapons
– highly polished menus
– Highly polished controls
– Deadly gun with all modern sniper zoom in/out feature.
– Ultimate sniper killer action.
– Exciting shooting war environment.
– Take out your enemies with head first kill shot.
– Smooth 3D Graphics.
– Optimised Game play
